original_title: Raise Hell: The Life & Times of Molly Ivins
overview: Molly Ivins was six feet of flame-haired Texas trouble. She was a prescient political journalist, best-selling author, and Bill of Rights warrior. She took no prisoners, leaving both sides of the aisle laughing and craving more of her razor-sharp wit. It's time to raise hell like Molly!
tagline: Her pen was mightier than politics.
title: Raise Hell: The Life & Times of Molly Ivins
